description:
I discovered this program while searching for a new option in place of AisleRiot, which I find ugly and not fun to play. The review (https://www.linux.com/news/it-takes-patience-find-best-solitaire/) offers all the highs and lows of this program, as well as the other 2 most common.

Good graphics; ability to change cards and background; hints; animation and auto-fill when it is appropriate are some of the things that makes this a great game.

The only thing that would make it better would be if when you click on the card the program automatically moves it to a logical location. (Note: there may be more than one logical location which would require the player to manually move a card). But I can't complain - this is one I'll keep playing.
summary: Great replacement for Windows solitaire - but better

description: it is a great card game set.
I never tried all the other solitaire games and I LOVE it! Can't stop playing Yukon!
